title: Not sure who to get now (approaching 4800IP in one more game)
body:
I won't get anyone below 3150 just saying, so no Corki, Teemo etc

What do you guys recommend?

replies.body: I know but... OP doesn't have enough... \*cries in the corner*
OP IF YOU SEE THIS SAVE UP FOR QUINN
I also know you love Quinn. Don't deny the Quinn inside of you, he deserves some aswell
one game off 4800? technically you are 1 game off 6300. play with a premade 5 and hope for the jackpot.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nJdb54vV,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-09T06:51:55.851+0000)
>
> one game off 4800? technically you are 1 game off 6300. play with a premade 5 and hope for the jackpot.

One game can get you 1500RP+??

o_O

> [{quoted}](name=xHeatFlashx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nJdb54vV,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-09T06:52:06.267+0000)
>
> Save till 6300 and get Vi? She is really really good in the jungle atm.

I hate Vi...she's freelo and imo I don't want to play such a broken champion such as her >__>

Plus her ult is getting a nerf soon

IP not RP. with the current bonus when playing with others. with 5 people you CAN get x16 the IP as a bonus. ive yet to see or hear of anyone get over 100....but w.e

vi is perfectly balanced....she is strong in the meta but she is hardly broken. but hey, i love vi.
she sure as hell isnt a riven.
a nerf to her ult...better not be anything other than CD. because the damage isnt huge and doing anything to the CC part of it would be horrible. nerfing the damage wouldnt change much of anything, nerfing the CD would/could be huge to her. but overall, not much changing to the ult would weaken her enough that she wouldnt still be decently balanced. changing ANY of her other abilties could kill her completely tho. since she relies on her whole kit to be able to jungle at all. and she is hardly a god at any 1 thing, she is a mini lee sin, jack of all trades, master of none.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nJdb54vV,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2015-03-09T11:03:30.290+0000)
>
> IP not RP. with the current bonus when playing with others. with 5 people you CAN get x16 the IP as a bonus. ive yet to see or hear of anyone get over 100....but w.e
> 
> vi is perfectly balanced....she is strong in the meta but she is hardly broken. but hey, i love vi.
> she sure as hell isnt a riven.
> a nerf to her ult...better not be anything other than CD. because the damage isnt huge and doing anything to the CC part of it would be horrible. nerfing the damage wouldnt change much of anything, nerfing the CD would/could be huge to her. but overall, not much changing to the ult would weaken her enough that she wouldnt still be decently balanced. changing ANY of her other abilties could kill her completely tho. since she relies on her whole kit to be able to jungle at all. and she is hardly a god at any 1 thing, she is a mini lee sin, jack of all trades, master of none.

Yeah lol I meant IP
But really 1500IP+ is achievable in one game?? o_O

Vi isn't balanced, she's just a tad stronger than almost every DPS jungler out there where she can build as tanky as she wants and still gets the damage of Jax or something...I've versed Vis before and 80% of them build a Warmogs and/or Frozen Mallet and ends put dealing the most damage on their team or something..

> [{quoted}](name=Skyprus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nJdb54vV,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-03-09T11:58:42.289+0000)
>
> I don't know what Champs cost by heart *shessh*.
> I vote Vi

:P I won't buy a champion that I don't like by heart..
Theres a reason why I haven't bought Teemo for 2+years :P

> [{quoted}](name=Batchy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nJdb54vV,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-03-09T08:59:12.997+0000)
>
> That makes no sense at all...
> 
> She is freelo, but a small nerf to her ult will make her unplayable?

Me not liking Vi has nothing to do with the ult nerf. I'll love the ult nerf cuz I won't play her, and it will make her just a tad weaker when I'm versing one (but then again I could have one on my own team)

> I hate Vi...she's freelo and imo I don't want to play such a broken champion such as her >__>
> 
> Plus her ult is getting a nerf soon

That makes no sense at all...

She is freelo, but a small nerf to her ult will make her unplayable?
brand. he's the most balanced out of all those champs.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nJdb54vV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-09T04:53:51.698+0000)
>
> brand. he's the most balanced out of all those champs.

I've never had interest in Brand, he deals good damage yes but I really prefer to play champions with some degree of mobility and I already have my 'group' of mid laners...
Also, if you say to bring him bot lane as a support, I prefer tank supports like Leona or Thresh :P

> [{quoted}](name=Crackdogrock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=nJdb54vV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-09T04:42:44.940+0000)
>
> kalista or jinx I reckon. Maybe even cassiopeia
> 
> Cass ult can just turn a teamfight
> 
> Kalista just puts stack into people and then E.
> 
> Jinx is a good carry all round

I've thought about Kalista for a while, and yeah she seems really fun to use, but I'm not so sure now after the slight changes to her passive...Also her classic is horrible compared to her skin >__>
Cass...well as I've said before I already have a 'group' of mid laners that I play often but I will consider Cass if I can't be bothered to save up for Kalista
Jinx...well I've never had interest in ADCs anyway...I hardly play bot, I'm more of a mid laner

I vote Vi
Brand. His ult is tricky to use AND STILL BUGGED but he's quite fun and fairly balanced.
Xerath op, if you want mobility Lee Sin op, if you want op op op mobility Riven op Kappa  (   ͡°  ͜ʖ   ͡°)
Xerath op, if you want mobility Lee Sin op, if you want op op op mobility Riven op Kappa
